main_tasks:
1. Support worldwide tier-1 customers to commercialize Wi-Fi/BT solution on both MediaTek and 3rd party platforms
2. Co-work with cross functional teams in MediaTek to speed up the solutions to customer problems
3. Develop and integration for Wi-Fi/BT software features on mobile SOCs
4. Develop and implement test plan and tools to verify and debug the SOC implementation.
5. Create application notes, technical memo/video, and provide training for customers
requirements:
1. Bachelor/Master Computer Science/Electronics/Electrical Engineering
2. 3+ years of experience with C or C++ or python
3. 2+ years of experienced with Android, Linux kernel and device driver development
4. 2+ years of software development experience in WiFi/Bluetooth is a strong plus
5.Strong verbal and written communication skills and ability to work within a diverse global team
jd:
Welcome to a world of opportunity!

MediaTek is always looking for talented people to work in our corporate offices around the world. We’re headquartered in Taiwan, but we also have sales and research subsidiaries in Mainland China, US, UK, Finland, Sweden, India, Japan, South Korea and Singapore.

We offer competitive salaries, a range of benefits and personalized programs for professional development.
For more information, please visit our website ＞＞ https://www.mediatek.com/who-we-are


주요업무
1. Support worldwide tier-1 customers to commercialize Wi-Fi/BT solution on both MediaTek and 3rd party platforms
2. Co-work with cross functional teams in MediaTek to speed up the solutions to customer problems
3. Develop and integration for Wi-Fi/BT software features on mobile SOCs
4. Develop and implement test plan and tools to verify and debug the SOC implementation.
5. Create application notes, technical memo/video, and provide training for customers

자격요건
1. Bachelor/Master Computer Science/Electronics/Electrical Engineering
2. 3+ years of experience with C or C++ or python
3. 2+ years of experienced with Android, Linux kernel and device driver development
4. 2+ years of software development experience in WiFi/Bluetooth is a strong plus
5.Strong verbal and written communication skills and ability to work within a diverse global team

우대사항
• Experience in peripheral device driver, such as PCIe/I2C/USB/I2S driver development is a plus

혜택 및 복지
• 가족 경조사 지원 (배우자 포함)
• 패밀리데이 운영
• 결혼, 출산 선물 제공
• 종합병원 건강검진 제공 (연 1회)
• 교육비,통신비,동호회비, 여름휴가비 지원
• 명절, 생일 상품권 지급
